about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of Arthanswold with the complete Witanlore: Dreamtime soundtrack. Explore the unique musical styling from every unexplored corner of the map as painted through sound and song.


  • 1. Oghdan's Dream
  • 2. Chut'que
  • 3. First Rays of Light Over Duan Rhod
  • 4. Kit'ke
  • 5. Kindred
  • 6. On the Valley
  • 7. Clawdance
  • 8. Witanwill
  • 9. Ballestra
  • 10. Deskara Stirs
  • 11. A Thousand Eyes
  • 12. Uncle's Tales
  • 13. Sons of the Bear
  • 14. Fairwood
  • 15. Fast Angling
  • 16. Journey
  • 17. Brigand Blade
  • 18. Revelations from a Prophecy
  • 19. The Veil
  • 20. Nightlore
  • 21. Heritage
  • 22. The Ritual
  • 23. The Great White Bear Mystery
  • 24. Meeting the Hooded Figure
  • 25. Ffyn's First Quarrel
  • 26. A New Tale is Born
  • 27. A Thousand Voices
  • 28. Blood Solstice
  • 29. The Queen
  • 30. The Queen's nest
  • 31. Geden's Peace
  • 32. He-Walks-Before
  • 33. Strings for a Fisherman
  • 34. Wenmera
  • 35. Remains of the Underwater Elders
  • 36. A Tragic Legacy

  • 39. Fair Breeze

  • 41. Hidden Temple

  • 46. Haggling Sailor
  • 47. Through the Canyon Wastes

  • 56. Faelora within the Veil
  • 57. Drinkin' Bear
  • 58. Nightwhispers
  • 59. Dreamworld
  • 60. Mother's Song
